projects.title: Mobile App UI Design
projects.description: Looking for a talented designer to create a modern mobile app UI that is clean, user-friendly, and optimized for Android and iOS.

milestones.title: Research & Wireframing
milestones.details: Understand client requirements, conduct competitor analysis, and create low-fidelity wireframes for key screens.

milestones.title: UI Design & Prototyping
milestones.details: Design all app screens in Figma using modern UI principles and brand color guidelines.

milestones.title: Client Review & Revisions
milestones.details: Collect feedback, apply requested changes, and prepare final deliverables.

projects.title: React Native Development
projects.description: Need an experienced React Native developer for a cross-platform app with strong UI and performance.

milestones.title: Project Setup & Architecture
milestones.details: Setup RN environment, navigation, and structure.

milestones.title: UI Development
milestones.details: Implement reusable UI components and responsive layouts.

milestones.title: API Integration
milestones.details: Integrate backend APIs and manage state.

milestones.title: Testing & Deployment
milestones.details: Perform QA testing, fix bugs, and prepare for app store submission.

projects.title: Food Delivery App for Pakistan
projects.description: We need a modern food delivery app similar to Foodpanda for the Pakistani market.

milestones.title: UI/UX Design & Wireframes
milestones.details: Complete app design and user flows.

milestones.title: Backend API Development
milestones.details: Database design and admin panel.

milestones.title: Mobile App Development
milestones.details: Develop RN app with core features.

milestones.title: Payment Integration & Testing
milestones.details: Integrate JazzCash and Easypaisa.

projects.title: Portfolio Website Redesign
projects.description: Redesign our portfolio website to be cleaner, faster, and responsive for all devices.

milestones.title: Wireframe & Layout Design
milestones.details: Plan new layout and UX flow.

milestones.title: Frontend Development
milestones.details: Code responsive pages using React and Tailwind CSS.

milestones.title: Testing & Launch
milestones.details: Cross-browser testing and deployment.

projects.title: E-commerce Website Development
projects.description: Looking for a full-stack developer to build a modern e-commerce platform with payment integration and admin panel.

milestones.title: Architecture & Setup
milestones.details: Setup project structure, database, and CI/CD.

milestones.title: Product Catalog & Cart
milestones.details: Implement product pages, search, filters, and cart functionality.

milestones.title: Payment Integration
milestones.details: Integrate Stripe/JazzCash and implement order flow.

milestones.title: Admin Panel & Testing
milestones.details: Build admin dashboard and perform QA.

projects.title: Node.js API Development for Mobile App
projects.description: Build secure and scalable backend APIs to power a React Native mobile application.

milestones.title: Database & API Setup
milestones.details: Design MongoDB schema and setup REST APIs with Express.

milestones.title: Authentication & User Management
milestones.details: Implement JWT authentication and user roles.

milestones.title: Testing & Deployment
milestones.details: Write unit tests and deploy to production server.

projects.title: React Native Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: Build a cross-platform fitness tracking app with workout history, custom plans, and progress charts.

milestones.title: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
milestones.details: Design user-friendly interfaces with focus on performance and usability.

milestones.title: Core App Development
milestones.details: Implement Firebase integration and activity tracking.

milestones.title: Testing & Launch
milestones.details: Perform app QA and deploy to Play Store.

projects.title: Real Estate Finder App
projects.description: Proposal for a cross-platform mobile app that helps users find properties for sale or rent with location-based search and real-time updates.

milestones.title: App Wireframes & Design
milestones.details: Create UI/UX mockups and user flow diagrams.

milestones.title: Property Listing & Map Integration
milestones.details: Develop property listing interface and integrate Google Maps API.

milestones.title: User Authentication & Notifications
milestones.details: Implement Firebase Auth and real-time push notifications for property updates.

milestones.title: Testing & Client Review
milestones.details: Conduct QA testing and submit the app for client approval.

projects.title: AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description: Build an AI-based resume builder that generates ATS-optimized resumes and portfolio pages for users.

milestones.title: User Interface & Auth
milestones.details: Login, signup, dashboard, and basic UI setup with Tailwind CSS.

milestones.title: AI Resume Engine
milestones.details: Integrate OpenAI APIs to generate ATS-friendly resumes and cover letters.

milestones.title: Portfolio & Export System
milestones.details: User portfolio page and PDF export functionality.

messages.content: Hi, I liked your portfolio. Are you available?

profile.name: alishba
profile.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
profile.bio: Creative and detail-oriented designer passionate about building smooth mobile experiences.

transactions.description: Payment received for Food Delivery App milestone
Payment received for UI Design project

reviews.comment: Excellent work on the mobile app! Delivered on time and communication was perfect.
Great design, smooth setup, and SEO optimization was very effective.
The app works flawlessly. Very satisfied with the development process.
